00002 #define _bool_h
00003 
00004 // "bool" is already defined by the GNU C++ compiler, version 2.7.2
00005 // MipsPRO compiler defines _BOOL macro if bool implementation is in use
00006 #if !(defined(__GNUC__) || defined(_BOOL))
00007 
00008 class istream;
00009 class ostream;
00010 
00011 
00012 class bool {
00013 public:
00014         bool(void) : value(0) {}
00015         bool(int value_) : value(value_ ? 1 : 0) {}
00016         operator int(void) const { return value; }
00017 
00018 private:
00019         short value;
00020 };
00021 
00022 extern const bool true;
00023 extern const bool false;
00024 
00025 istream &operator>>(istream &is, bool &b);
00026 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const bool &b);

00028 #endif /* __GNUC__ || _BOOL */
